text: Archibald Hastie (1791 – 9 November 1857) was a British Radical politician. Buchan was elected Radical MP for Paisley at a by-election in 1836—caused by the resignation of Alexander Graham Speirs—and held the seat until his death in 1857. ==References== ==External links== * Category:UK MPs 1835–1837 Category:UK MPs 1837–1841 Category:UK MPs 1841–1847 Category:UK MPs 1847–1852 Category:UK MPs 1852–1857 Category:UK MPs 1857–1859 Category:1791 births Category:1857 deaths Category:Whig (British political party) MPs for Scottish constituencies Category:Scottish Liberal Party MPs
title: Archibald Hastie (MP)
